111.content:
Anne was a smart girl, that was for sure, but she wasn't very lucky. Being a stripper wasn't her first career choice, but everyone knows how tough the job market is these days. Anne had a great body, so after much deliberation she concluded that she would take up this job to pay the bills until something more suited to her education presented itself. Still, after all this time Anne had gotten used to her bad luck. She typically prepared for the worst and hoped for the best, and in doing so she was always prepared. Nothing, however, could have prepared her for what was about to happen.

Just as with any other room in any other building, a few thousand dust particles floated around Anne's dressing room. One of these particles, however, was different from the others. Anne had less than a one in a million chance of inhaling it, but then again, luck was never on her side. The dust particle floated past her face without incident, but then Anne turned around. Now, her nose was directly over the sinister piece of dust. Not knowing what trouble she was getting herself into, Anne breathed in, just as any normal, unknowing person would do. The dust particle was sucked up toward her nose. It flew into her right nostril, ricocheting off of a few nose hairs along the way. Eventually, it lodged itself against the side of the nostril and stuck fast.

"Ack! I feel like something just went up my nose!" Anne yelped to no one in particular. She raised her hand up to her face and rubbed the underside of her nose with her finger. It felt as if something very tiny yet very noticeable had just flown up into one of her nostrils. It was hardly a pleasant feeling, so Anne wanted to get rid of it before heading out to perform. Looking around just to make sure no one was watching, she inserted her finger into her right nostril and picked her nose. Nothing came out, but the irritation died down.

132.content:
Anne looked in the mirror of her dressing room, and, as she looked in the mirror, she took a deep breath. Tonight was the first time she'd be leading a strip job by herself. And she needed to make sure she didn't loose control of her gift, or, as she put it, 'curse'.
You see, miss Anne had a bit of a secret: she could enlarge areas of her body, as well as change her height. She discovered it a few months after puberty hit, and it was why she was as volumptous and as tall as she was.
Of course, she still wished that she could get rid of it, but, alas, she could not.
She did like the idea of an hourglass figure, however, and often saw how extreme she could push it, although she rarely got past a ratio of 1:1/2.
This time, however, she was gonna use it in a job, tease the boys, and girls. Things like that.
"Hunny Bear! On in five!"
Anne smiled. She almost couldn't wait that long.

Surprisingly, to Anne, she managed to stave off the boredome that came from waiting so long.
"Hunny Bear! Time!"
Grinning, she headed to the stage, then paused at the edge, waiting. The other girls wouldn't enter til she was on.
Slowly, she moved her leg out onto the stage, revealing the fishnet stockings she wore, and one burgundy heel. Teasingly, she let it slide off her foot, before finishing the step. She glided across the stage, the other two entering upon her arrival at stage center. By then, she had 'lost' her other shoe, and the jacket she had been wearing at the start.
She smiled at the crowd, peeling off her shirt, revealing a crop top underneath.
She pulled off her shorts, throwing them into the crowd, revealing an ass that should not have fit within them.
She pulled off her crop to, revealing a partially straining bra.
Some of the people began to catcall, others whooped, some yelling, screaming "More!"
She grinned and tore off her fishnets, tossing them into the air, her ass even larger. Boy was this stimulating for poor Anne, who found it hard to control her gift whenever she got even a little aroused.
